tokenize

public Tree<StringWrapper.SubString> tokenize(java.lang.String text)
Create a tree with the exhaustive set of definable tokens from text.

The child of a node contains words that follow the parent. Siblings are alternative definable words starting at the same position.

tokenize

public Tree<StringWrapper.SubString> tokenize(StringWrapper stringWrapper)
Create a tree with the exhaustive set of definable tokens from text.

The child of a node contains words that follow the parent. Siblings are alternative definable words starting at the same position.
